mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{todayStart} AND #{todayEnd} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TODAY_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{monthStart} AND #{monthEnd} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MONTH_CNT FROM RESERVATION

SELECT COUNT(RECORD_ID) AS "VISIT_CNT" FROM RECORD R, (SELECT RESERV_ID FROM RESERVATION R, (SELECT O.OT_ID FROM TIMETABLE T, (SELECT OT_ID, TIMETABLE_ID FROM OPENING_TIME WHERE YEAR_DATE = #{today}) O WHERE T.TIMETABLE_ID = O.TIMETABLE_ID AND TIME BETWEEN '09:00' AND #{time}) A WHERE R.OT_ID = A.OT_ID) AT WHERE R.RESERV_ID = AT.RESERV_ID UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(R.RECORD_ID) FROM RECORD R, (SELECT R.RESERV_ID FROM RESERVATION R, (SELECT OT_ID FROM OPENING_TIME WHERE YEAR_DATE LIKE #{month}) O WHERE R.OT_ID = O.OT_ID) T WHERE R.RESERV_ID = T.RESERV_ID

SELECT COUNT(R.RESERV_ID) AS "RESERV_CNT" FROM RESERVATION R, (SELECT OT_ID FROM OPENING_TIME WHERE YEAR_DATE = #{today}) O WHERE R.OT_ID = O.OT_ID UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(RESERV_ID) FROM RESERVATION R, (SELECT O.OT_ID FROM TIMETABLE T, (SELECT OT_ID, TIMETABLE_ID FROM OPENING_TIME WHERE YEAR_DATE = #{today}) O WHERE T.TIMETABLE_ID = O.TIMETABLE_ID AND TIME BETWEEN '09:00' AND #{time}) A WHERE R.OT_ID = A.OT_ID UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(R.RESERV_ID) FROM RESERVATION R, (SELECT OT_ID FROM OPENING_TIME WHERE YEAR_DATE LIKE #{month}) O WHERE R.OT_ID = O.OT_ID

SELECT U.USER_PHONE_NUM, R.CREATED_AT FROM USER_CLIENT U, (SELECT USER_NUM, CREATED_AT FROM RESERVATION WHERE CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{todayStart} AND #{todayEnd} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC) R WHERE U.USER_NUM = R.USER_NUM
